Package Exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ActionException
    This exception represent an action with the wrong format
    BoardException
    This exception represent an action that is trying to move out of the board
    ClimbingException
    This exception represent an action that is climbing over a pawn
    DiagonalException
    This exception represent an action that is moving a pawn diagonally
    PawnException
    This exception represent an action of a player that is trying to move an enemy or an empty pawn
    StopException
    This exception represent an action that is trying to do nothing
    ThroneException
    This exception represent an action that is trying to move a pawn into the throne
